segments.text: Have the owners answered back with a counter-offer for my offer to purchase the house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In response to your offer , the sellers have decided to counter-offer three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds pretty good to me , but I am not sure what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can accept this offer or decline it and come up with another offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I make another offer and they refuse , then what ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Personally , I would consider making one more offer , but it is up to you to decide what to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let â€™ s try going with three hundred and thirty thousand dollars for a counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will contact the sellers with your current offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that this will move along fairly quickly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually the response to the second offer moves along a bit more quickly than the first one .
segments.speaker: S2
